title: Are you satisfied yet
excerpt: Turn on Netflix. Choose from what's trending. Almost anything you watch is going to hold your interest for at least an hour.

children.text: Turn on Netflix. Choose from what's trending. Almost anything you watch is going to hold your interest for at least an hour.
Or open Doordash. Choose a random entree from a random restaurant. Unless you're super picky, or you have allergies, you'll likely enjoy it.
Or even, consider the choice of what car to drive. Book an Uber. Find the cheapest car. I'm confident it'll get you where you need to go.

Ours is a culture of unlimited choice and a world of options. So while it can be tempting--fun even--to attempt to maximize everything--to make the best choice or have the best taste--it can also be both a fickle and futile sort of thing.
Because if you merely intend to be satisfied, you likely already have what you need.
